localization.setLocalilty.result: function f(ctx, params) {const ccs = ctx.get('localizationSettings');console.log(`Set locality params =>`, params);ccs.locality = params && params.value;ctx.set('localizationSettings', ccs, '12345');console.log(`*** Updated the locality value for ccs locality ***`);return null;}

localization.setCountryCode.result: function f(ctx, params) {const ccs = ctx.get('localizationSettings');console.log(`Set country code params =>`, params);ccs.countryCode = params && params.value;ctx.set('localizationSettings', ccs, '12345');console.log(`*** Updated the country code value for ccs country code ***`);return null;}

localization.setLanguage.result: function f(ctx, params) {const ccs = ctx.get('localizationSettings');console.log(`Set language params =>`, params);ccs.language = params && params.value;ctx.set('localizationSettings', ccs, '12345');console.log(`*** Updated the language value for ccs language ***`);return null;}

localization.setLocale.result: function f(ctx, params) {const ccs = ctx.get('localizationSettings');console.log(`Set locale params =>`, params);ccs.locale = params && params.value;ctx.set('localizationSettings', ccs, '12345');console.log(`*** Updated the locale value for ccs locale ***`);return null;}
